ygData.subject: OT - Re: [eq_wizards] Mana Management, and other topics
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  ... I have no problem managing the several lists I m on, the SoCal Rave list used to generate hundreds a day, every day. I use Forte Inc. s Agent as
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 21 Apr 1999 00:40:35 -0400, you wrote:

>From: Vince Seese <seese@...>
>
>First off - MAN a lot of mail, just caught up.
>
>Reading waay back, I was surprised to see that most people don't like
<snip>
>hit with the initial 200+ mail, but still! Any idea from anyone how we
>can make this more manageable?
>Micon / Karana

I have no problem managing the several lists I'm on, the SoCal Rave
list used to generate hundreds a day, every day.

I use Forte Inc.'s Agent as my mail and newsgroup reader and I don't
think it can be rivaled. The filtering is as complex as you want to
get and easy as you need it to be if you're new to filtering.

Just MHO.
p.s. Micon, what race and area are you in?
Dayne, Faern, House D'Gorith, Guild Har'oloth
Karana Server
http://www.geocities.com/~khardis/guild.htm
